scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:libpg_query && npm run build:wasm
scripts.build:libpg_query: (cd libpg_query && sed -i.bak 's/AR = .*/AR = emar rs/' Makefile && emmake make build)
scripts.build:wasm: emcc -o dist/hello.mjs -s EXIT_RUNTIME=0 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_parse -I libpg_query -L libpg_query -l pg_query hello.c
